channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: German FA slaps down proposal to boycott World Cup as Trump rebuke: ‘debates on sports policy should be conducted internally and not in public’

item.title: South American leader defies Trump's ‘Donroe Doctrine’ in bold China pivot toward Xi
item.description: Uruguayan President Orsi reportedly defies Trump's "Donroe Doctrine" by signing key trade deals with China's Xi Jinping in historic Beijing meeting.

item.title: Freedom 250 To Bring IndyCar Racing To D.C. Streets For America’s Birthday Bash
item.description: Just when you thought you had heard every possible joke about gridlock in Washington, along comes IndyCar to break up the monotony.

item.title: Thank Your Local ICE Agents For Their Service
item.description: Even when some make wrong decisions, ICE and CBP agents broadly deserve our honor and respect.

item.title: WSJ Anonymous Hit Piece On Gabbard Is Based On Complaints That ‘Weren’t Credible’

item.title: How Five Common Chinese Expressions Help Explain Beijing’s Conflicting Chip Signals

item.title: Noem responds to Bad Bunny, Billie Eilish bashing ICE at Grammys: 'I wish they knew'
item.description: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem reacts to ICE-bashing at the Grammy Awards, telling Fox News Digital that the criticism is "ill-informed."

item.title: Oracle billionaire Larry Ellison’s next big bet: Redefining how long–and how well–we live
item.description: As people live longer and birth rates fall, longevity is becoming a major challenge–and opportunity–for business and society alike.

item.title: One of the most generous welfare states in the world is no match for the ‘motherhood penalty’
item.description: Subsidized child care is available for all children from 6 months old in Denmark, and parents pay no more than 25.%. Pay for women still goes down.

item.title: AI Rejects Truth And Virtue Because Our Culture Taught It To
item.description: Real truth and actual intelligence will never be 'artificial.'

item.title: Famed startup incubator Y Combinator to let founders receive funds in stablecoins
item.description: The move is significant since, in the past, generally just crypto VC firms have let startups receive funding in the form of digital assets.

item.title: Latin America Is Shifting Right and Toward the U.S.
item.description: The trend vindicates President Trump’s decision to reassert influence in Latin America.
